732426f-a.title: Occupations - Peddlers - Food - Fruit.
732426f-a.text:
Dealer in foodstuffs and fruit, corner of Hester and Ludlow Streets.
-April 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
732426f-a.folder: Hester Street and Ludlow Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

721140f-a.text:
Ludlow Street, at the N.E. corner of Hester Street. The peddler shown, in the foreground, is characteristic of this neighborhood.
May 14, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
721140f-a.folder: Ludlow Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

720413f-b.text:
(1)
Hester Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of Ludlow Street. Also shown is Ludlow Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of Hester Street. Nos. 52-46 Hester Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of Ludlow Street, are 3-story frame buildings.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 547.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
May 14, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
Neg: 2778

721139f-a.text:
Ludlow Street, east side, north from (No. 38), but not including Hester Street.
P. L. Sperr.
